name: Zombie Apocalipse (SMVSoftware)
description:
A very dificult Top-Down Zombie Killer

Get all the medicines to advance to the next level. Don't let the Zombies touch you!

Move with WASD or the arrows, and use the Mouse to aim and shoot.

You can also use a Joystick.

Note: The game is currently in development, with new features being added every few days.
